contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = Northern krill | image = Meganyctiphanes norvegica.jpg | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Arthropod]]a | subphylum = [[Crustacean|Crustacea]] | classis = [[Malacostraca]] | ordo = [[Krill|Euphausiacea]] | familia = [[Euphausiidae]] | genus = '''''Meganyctiphanes''''' | genus_authority = [[Ernest William Lyons Holt|Holt]] & [[Walter Medley Tattersall|Tattersall]], 1905 | species = '''''M. norvegica''''' | binomial = ''Meganyctiphanes norvegica'' | binomial_authority = ([[Michael Sars|M. Sars]], 1857) }} '''Northern krill''', '''''Meganyctiphanes norvegica''''', is a [[species]] of [[krill]] that lives in the [[North Atlantic Ocean]]. It is an important component of the [[zooplankton]], providing food for [[whale]]s, [[fish]] and [[bird]]s. (In the [[Southern Ocean]], [[Antarctic krill]] ''[[Euphausia superba]]'' fills a similar role.) ''M. norvegica'' is the only species recognised in the genus '''''Meganyctiphanes''''',<ref name="WoRMS">{{cite web |author=Volker Siegel |year=2011 |title=''Meganyctiphanes'' Holt & Tattersall, 1905 |editor=Volker Siegel |work=World Euphausiacea database |publisher=[[World Register of Marine Species]] |url=http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id=110674 |accessdate=February 26, 2011}}</ref> although it has been known by several [[synonym (taxonomy)|synonyms]]: *''Euphausia intermedia'' <small></small> *''Euphausia lanei'' <small>Holt & Tattersall, 1905</small> *''Meganyctiphanes calmani'' <small></small> *''Nyctiphanes norvegicus'' <small>G. O. Sars, 1883</small> *''Thysanopoda norvegica'' <small></small> ==References== {{reflist}} == External links == {{TaxonIds |itis=95533 |eol=509431 |ncbi=48144 |worms=110690}} *{{cite web |url=http://nlbif.eti.uva.nl/bis/crustacea.php?menuentry=soorten&id=8 |title=''Meganyctiphanes norvegica'' (M. Sars, 1857) |work=Macrobenthos of the North Sea: Crustacea |publisher=[[University of Amsterdam|Universiteit van Amsterdam]]}} *{{cite web |url=http://species-identification.org/species.php?species_group=euphausiids&id=47 |title=''Meganyctiphanes norvegica'' (M. Sars, 1857) |work=Euphausiids of the World |publisher=Marine Species Identification Portal}} *{{cite web |url=http://www.arcodiv.org/watercolumn/euphausiid/Meganyctiphanes_norvegica.html |title=''Meganyctiphanes norvegica'' (M. Sars, 1857) |work=Arctic Ocean Diversity |author=Alexei Pinchuk & Russ Hopcroft |date=September 3, 2010}} *{{Commons category-inline|Meganyctiphanes norvegica|''Meganyctiphanes norvegica''}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Northern Krill}} [[Category:Krill]] [[Category:Crustaceans of the Atlantic Ocean]] [[Category:Animals described in 1856]] {{Malacostraca-stub}}
